game.engine2D

Class Engine2DRectangleBoundingBox

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.engine2D.Engine2DBoundingBox
      • game.engine2D.Engine2DRectangleBoundingBox

  • public class Engine2DRectangleBoundingBox
extends Engine2DBoundingBox
    The bounding box will be in a shape of a rectangle and you have to provide the x, y, width and height of the bounding box. The bounding box also has methods to check for collision with another bounding box

      • Fields inherited from class game.engine2D.Engine2DBoundingBox
